item.title: Jason add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "There are three things all wise men fear: the sea in storm, a night with no moon, and the anger of a gentle man." -- Patrick Rothfuss

item.title: Jason add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "Words are pale shadows of forgotten names. As names have power, words have power. Words can light fires in the minds of men. Words can wring tears from the hardest hearts." -- Patrick Rothfuss

item.title: Jason add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "I've always been very confident in my immaturity." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Jason add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "If you're always on time, it implies that you never have anything better you should be doing. -Kelsier" -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Jason add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "The purpose of a storyteller is not to tell you how to think, but to give you questions to think upon." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Jason add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
item.description: "Better to be the failure who nobly strived than the success who never really had to." -- Brandon Sanderson

item.title: Jason add a quote by Brandon Sanderson
